task.title: Add Participant
task.shortdesc: Add a new participant to a session.

step.cmd: Click the Add Participant button at the right of the Participants field.
step.stepresult: The Edit Participant window will appear.

step.cmd: Enter the participants Name, Birthday, Language, Group, Gender, Education and Role. Click Ok.

stepresult.note: The age for each participant is calculated automatically based on the birth date and the session date. You must enter a birthday (or a best guess) such that the application will not calculate a negative age.

step.cmd: Repeat Steps 1 and 2 for each participant.
